DOC.brief_summary: Sixty healthy subject age 18 50 randomly allocate three treatment group : Conventional Cryolipolysis , Contrast Cryolipolysis Recovery Reperfusion Cryolipolysis . The region treat accord individual need , region abdomen flank . Assessments body composition perform baseline 30 , 60 90 day randomization . Blood collection also perform baseline 14 21 day randomization evaluation lipid profile liver function .
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject Body mass index > 29.9 Kg/m2 Pregnancy Diabetes Cancer Vascular diseases Heart diseases Liposuction surgical procedure body contour Active infection Wounds Paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria Cold urticaria Significant weight change past 3 month treatment
